shredder 0.0.8

Interacting with tidybayes

Source: vignettes/tidybayes.Rmd
tidybayes.Rmd
library(rstan)
#> Loading required package: StanHeaders
#> Loading required package: ggplot2
#> rstan (Version 2.19.2, GitRev: 2e1f913d3ca3)
#> For execution on a local, multicore CPU with excess RAM we recommend calling
#> options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores()).
#> To avoid recompilation of unchanged Stan programs, we recommend calling
#> rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
library(shredder)
library(tidybayes)

tidybayes

rats <- shredder::rats_example(nCores = 1)

Spread

rats%>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 4,000 x 5
#>    .chain .iteration .draw mu_alpha mu_beta
#>     <int>      <int> <int>    <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1     241.    6.11
#>  2      1          2     2     242.    6.16
#>  3      1          3     3     242.    6.26
#>  4      1          4     4     244.    6.24
#>  5      1          5     5     243.    6.06
#>  6      1          6     6     242.    6.15
#>  7      1          7     7     242.    6.28
#>  8      1          8     8     242.    6.20
#>  9      1          9     9     245.    6.08
#> 10      1         10    10     247.    6.19
#> # … with 3,990 more rows

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 8 x 5
#>   .chain .iteration .draw mu_alpha mu_beta
#>    <int>      <int> <int>    <dbl>   <dbl>
#> 1      1          1     1     247.    6.20
#> 2      1          2     2     242.    6.05
#> 3      2          1     3     241.    6.40
#> 4      2          2     4     245.    6.16
#> 5      3          1     5     241.    6.01
#> 6      3          2     6     245.    6.32
#> 7      4          1     7     240.    6.23
#> 8      4          2     8     240.    6.29

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(alpha[i],beta[i])
#> # A tibble: 240 x 6
#> # Groups:   i [30]
#>    .chain .iteration .draw     i alpha  beta
#>     <int>      <int> <int> <int> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1     1  238.  6.06
#>  2      1          1     1     2  247.  7.20
#>  3      1          1     1     3  259.  6.59
#>  4      1          1     1     4  231.  5.16
#>  5      1          1     1     5  231.  6.75
#>  6      1          1     1     6  247.  5.91
#>  7      1          1     1     7  229.  5.69
#>  8      1          1     1     8  250.  6.60
#>  9      1          1     1     9  282.  7.21
#> 10      1          1     1    10  220.  5.19
#> # … with 230 more rows

Gather

rats%>%
  tidybayes::gather_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 8,000 x 5
#> # Groups:   .variable [2]
#>    .chain .iteration .draw .variable .value
#>     <int>      <int> <int> <chr>      <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1 mu_alpha    241.
#>  2      1          2     2 mu_alpha    242.
#>  3      1          3     3 mu_alpha    242.
#>  4      1          4     4 mu_alpha    244.
#>  5      1          5     5 mu_alpha    243.
#>  6      1          6     6 mu_alpha    242.
#>  7      1          7     7 mu_alpha    242.
#>  8      1          8     8 mu_alpha    242.
#>  9      1          9     9 mu_alpha    245.
#> 10      1         10    10 mu_alpha    247.
#> # … with 7,990 more rows

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::gather_draws(mu_alpha,mu_beta)
#> # A tibble: 16 x 5
#> # Groups:   .variable [2]
#>    .chain .iteration .draw .variable .value
#>     <int>      <int> <int> <chr>      <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1 mu_alpha  240.  
#>  2      1          2     2 mu_alpha  239.  
#>  3      2          1     3 mu_alpha  247.  
#>  4      2          2     4 mu_alpha  241.  
#>  5      3          1     5 mu_alpha  240.  
#>  6      3          2     6 mu_alpha  245.  
#>  7      4          1     7 mu_alpha  240.  
#>  8      4          2     8 mu_alpha  243.  
#>  9      1          1     1 mu_beta     6.11
#> 10      1          2     2 mu_beta     6.18
#> 11      2          1     3 mu_beta     6.41
#> 12      2          2     4 mu_beta     6.09
#> 13      3          1     5 mu_beta     6.01
#> 14      3          2     6 mu_beta     6.32
#> 15      4          1     7 mu_beta     6.21
#> 16      4          2     8 mu_beta     6.15

rats%>%
  stan_sample_n(2)%>%
  tidybayes::gather_draws(alpha[i],beta[i])
#> # A tibble: 480 x 6
#> # Groups:   i, .variable [60]
#>    .chain .iteration .draw     i .variable .value
#>     <int>      <int> <int> <int> <chr>      <dbl>
#>  1      1          1     1     1 alpha       247.
#>  2      1          1     1     2 alpha       244.
#>  3      1          1     1     3 alpha       255.
#>  4      1          1     1     4 alpha       237.
#>  5      1          1     1     5 alpha       227.
#>  6      1          1     1     6 alpha       245.
#>  7      1          1     1     7 alpha       228.
#>  8      1          1     1     8 alpha       250.
#>  9      1          1     1     9 alpha       284.
#> 10      1          1     1    10 alpha       223.
#> # … with 470 more rows
